		                    Ciliary Body Melanoma
		                    Treatment of tumors in the ciliary body and choroid may include the following:         -  Plaque radiation therapy.    -  Charged-particle external-beam radiation therapy.    -  Surgery (resection or enucleation).        Check the list of NCI-supported cancer cli
